description.value: This Composition profile contains information of a live birth and the issuance of a Birth Certificate to be recorded and communicated to the national statistics agency.

short.value: Jurisdiction Live Birth Report
Birth Number
Local File No.
Date filed by registrar
In the case of a live birth sent in error, a status of 'entered-in-error' must be set.

definition.value: In the case of a live birth sent in error, a status of 'entered-in-error' must be set.

short.value: Jurisdiction live birth report Document

definition.value: Jurisdiction live birth report Document

short.value: The subject of the composition is the newborn baby

definition.value: The subject of the composition as a whole is the newborn baby. Different sections in the composition have different focus (e.g.: the mother).

short.value: The Encounter for the Composition is the newborn's birth encounter.

definition.value: The Encounter for the Composition is the newborn's birth encounter. This Encounter links to the mother's encounter by the Encounter.partOf data element.

short.value: Date report completed
The author is the jurisdictional Vital Records Office.

definition.value: The author is the jurisdictional Vital Records Office.

short.value: The Composition is broken into sections that, where possible, align with the sections in the Live Birth Certificate.

definition.value: The Composition is broken into sections that, where possible, align with the sections in the Live Birth Certificate. Various administrative and demographic data in the Birth Certificate are contained in other locations in the Composition, such as the Patient and Encounter profiles.

short.value: Mother (prenatal) section on the Live Birth Certificate

definition.value: This section contains items from the Mother (prenatal) on theLive Birth Certificate.

short.value: Prenatal records

definition.value: Prenatal records

short.value: The focus of this section is the mother

definition.value: The subject of the composition as a whole is the newborn baby. The focus of this section in the composition is the mother.

short.value: Entries that are contained in the Mother Prenatal section

definition.value: Entries that are contained in the Mother Prenatal section

short.value: Planned to deliver at home

definition.value: Planned to deliver at home

short.value: First prenatal care visit

definition.value: Date that mother had her first prenatal care visit.

short.value: Number of prenatal care visits

definition.value: Those visits which are listed in the mother's prenatal care and/or facility records.

short.value: Date last normal menses began

definition.value: Date that the mother's last normal menses began. This item is used to compute the gestational age of the infant.

short.value: Number of previous live births now living

definition.value: The pregnancy history of the mother with respect to previous children born alive

short.value: Number of previous live births now dead

definition.value: The pregnancy history of the mother with respect to previous children born alive

short.value: Date of last live birth

definition.value: The pregnancy history of the mother with respect to previous children born alive

short.value: Number of other pregnancy outcomes

definition.value: The pregnancy history of the mother with respect to other pregnancy outcomes (included pregnancy losses of any gestational age, e.g., spontaneous or induced losses or ectopic pregnancies).

short.value: Date of last other pregnancy outcome

definition.value: The pregnancy history of the mother with respect to other pregnancy outcomes (included pregnancy losses of any gestational age, e.g., spontaneous or induced losses or ectopic pregnancies).

short.value: Principal source of payment for this delivery

definition.value: The principal payer for this delivery

short.value: Mother's weight at delivery

definition.value: The mother's weight at the time of delivery

short.value: Mother's height

definition.value: The mother's height

short.value: Mother's prepregnancy weight

definition.value: The mother's prepregnancy weight

short.value: Use of the WIC nutritional program by the mother

definition.value: Use of the Women, Infant's, and Children (WIC) nutritional program by the mother during the pregnancy.

short.value: Cigarettes smoked by the mother before and during the pregnancy

definition.value: The number of cigarettes or packs of cigarettes the mother smoked 3 months before and at various intervals during the pregnancy

short.value: Medical and Health Information section on the Live Birth Certificate

definition.value: This section contains items from the Medical and Health Information section on the Live Birth Certificate.

short.value: Clinical information

definition.value: Clinical information

short.value: The focus of this section is the mother

definition.value: The subject of the composition as a whole is the newborn baby. The focus of this section in the composition is the mother.

short.value: Entries that are contained in the medical and health information section

definition.value: Entries that are contained in the medical and health information section

short.value: Risk factors in this pregnancy

definition.value: Selected medical risk factors of the mother during this pregnancy

short.value: If mother had a previous cesarean delivery, how many

definition.value: Number of previous cesarean deliveries.

short.value: Infections present and/or treated during this pregnancy

definition.value: Selected infections that the mother had or was treated for during the course of this pregnancy

short.value: Obstetric procedures

definition.value: Selected medical treatments or invasive/manipulative procedures performed during this pregnancy specifically for management of labor and delivery

short.value: Characteristics of labor and delivery

definition.value: Information about the course of labor and delivery

short.value: Fetal presentation at birth

definition.value: Fetal presentation at birth

short.value: Final route and method of delivery

definition.value: Final route and method of delivery

short.value: Maternal morbidity (complications associated with labor and delivery)

definition.value: Serious complications experienced by the mother associated with labor and delivery

short.value: Newborn section on the Live Birth Certificate

definition.value: This section contains items from the newborn section on the Live Birth Certificate.

short.value: Newborn delivery information

definition.value: Newborn delivery information

short.value: Entries that are contained in the newborn section

definition.value: Entries that are contained in the newborn section
The weight of the infant/fetus at birth/delivery

short.value: Obstetric estimate of gestation

definition.value: The obstetric estimate of the infant’s gestation in completed weeks based on the birth/delivery attendant’s final estimate of gestation which should be determined by all perinatal factors and assessments such as ultrasound, but not the neonatal exam

short.value: Apgar Score - while the Apgar timing value set contains 3 possible values, 5 and 10 are the only scores used.

definition.value: The Apgar Score for the child.

short.value: Number of live births this delivery
Abnormal conditions of the newborn

definition.value: Disorders or significant morbidity experienced by the newborn infant

short.value: Congenital anomolies of the newborn

definition.value: Malformations of the newborn diagnosed prenatally or after delivery

short.value: Is infant living at time of report?

definition.value: Information on the infant's survival

short.value: Is infant being breastfed at discharge?

definition.value: Information on whether the infant is being breastfed at discharge from the hospital

short.value: Mother administrative section on the Live Birth Certificate

definition.value: This section contains items from the Mother administrative section on the Live Birth Certificate.

short.value: Mother's administrative information

definition.value: Mother's administrative information

short.value: The focus of this section is the mother

definition.value: The subject of the composition as a whole is the newborn baby. The focus of this section in the composition is the mother.

short.value: Entries that are contained in the motherInformation section

definition.value: Entries that are contained in the motherInformation section

short.value: Mother married during pregnancy

definition.value: Was mother married at conception, at the time of birth, or at any time between conception and giving birth?

short.value: Was social security number requested for the child

definition.value: Was social security number requested for the child

short.value: Mother's education

definition.value: Mother's education

short.value: Father section on the Live Birth Certificate

definition.value: This section contains items from the father section on the Live Birth Certificate.

short.value: Father's administrative information

definition.value: Father's administrative information

short.value: The focus of this section is the father

definition.value: The subject of the composition as a whole is the newborn baby. The focus of this section in the composition is the father.

short.value: Entries that are contained in the fatherInformation section

definition.value: Entries that are contained in the fatherInformation section

short.value: Paternity acknowledgement signed by father

definition.value: Whether or not a paternity acknowledgement was signed by the father if the mother was not married at conception, at the time of birth, or at any time between conception and giving birth.

short.value: Father's education

definition.value: Father's education

short.value: Edit Flags Section

definition.value: This section contains the edit flags that specify whether the originally provided data passed validation checks. These validation checks are done at the jurisdiction prior to sending to the National Statistical Agency and are based on edit criteria in the Birth Edit Specifications for the 2003 Proposed Revision of the U.S. Standard Certificate of Birth and the Fetal Death Edit Specifications for the 2003 Revision of the U.S. Standard Report of Fetal Death.

short.value: Edit flags section
